meanings.sent1: The town celebrated its sesquicentennial with a big parade.
meanings.sent2: My grandparents will be attending the sesquicentennial of their wedding next year.
meanings.sent3: At the sesquicentennial party, everyone dressed up in old-fashioned clothes.
meanings.sent4: The sesquicentennial of the school was a time to reflect on its history.
meanings.sent5: The sesquicentennial marked a significant milestone for the community.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed artifacts from the sesquicentennial celebration.
meanings.sent2: The sesquicentennial event was a memorable occasion for all attendees.
meanings.sent3: She wore a special dress to the sesquicentennial ball.
meanings.sent4: The sesquicentennial decorations added a festive touch to the venue.
meanings.sent5: The sesquicentennial banner hung proudly in the town square.
